experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: • Developed and maintained modules using React Native with Redux for application features, posts listing, modules for liking, sharing, & commenting, with smooth animations with gesture handlers• Spearheaded the development of critical component, streamlining integration across multiple modules reducing integration time (75%) and enhanced performance (15%), boosting team efficiency• Maintained and Improvised React Native modules with MobX for efficient state management, resulting in a 30% increase in user interaction across multiple platforms.• Collaborated with team to optimize performance (70%) and elevate code quality standards, implementing efficient coding practices
experience.description_html: • Developed and maintained modules using React Native with Redux for application features, posts listing, modules for liking, sharing, & commenting, with smooth animations with gesture handlers• Spearheaded the development of critical component, streamlining integration across multiple modules reducing integration time (75%) and enhanced performance (15%), boosting team efficiency• Maintained and Improvised React Native modules with MobX for efficient state management, resulting in a 30% increase in user interaction across multiple platforms.• Collaborated with team to optimize performance (70%) and elevate code quality standards, implementing efficient coding practices

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: • Revamped a horizontally scalable and maintainable server using Elastic-beanstalk and CI/CD pipeline    using CircleCI and AWS Code Deploy decreasing deployment & server downtime by 30%•  Developed the cross-platform application using React Native and Redux / Redux Toolkit for central    state management and API Layer.•  Engineered backend with GraphQL, Sequelize, & Cloud services•  Enhanced website performance by 100% through strategic implementation of Dynamic Import for    efficient resource loading, Next/Image , and Pagination to streamline content navigation.•  Built FE & BE for the internal CRM Portal, building services like order, product and user management,     customer support, sales dashboard, and engagement notification with RBAC for operations.
experience.description_html: • Revamped a horizontally scalable and maintainable server using Elastic-beanstalk and CI/CD pipeline  using CircleCI and AWS Code Deploy decreasing deployment & server downtime by 30%• Developed the cross-platform application using React Native and Redux / Redux Toolkit for central  state management and API Layer.• Engineered backend with GraphQL, Sequelize, & Cloud services• Enhanced website performance by 100% through strategic implementation of Dynamic Import for  efficient resource loading, Next/Image , and Pagination to streamline content navigation.• Built FE & BE for the internal CRM Portal, building services like order, product and user management,  customer support, sales dashboard, and engagement notification with RBAC for operations.

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Part of the 23 Member Core Team of the symposium which is responsible for Publicity and Sponsorship•Solely garnered INR 2.25 lakhs worth net corporate sponsorship and alumni contribution from regions of Mumbai•Approached Messaging Companies and Media Platforms to have them as Messaging and Online Media Partners•Led a team of 42 Campus Affiliates &12 Campus Ambassadors responsible for the publicity of Kshitij 2020•As Web Sub-coordinator managed Kshitij's official website and ensured the update about the fest
positions.title: Core Organising Team Member
positions.description_html:
Part of the 23 Member Core Team of the symposium which is responsible for Publicity and Sponsorship
•Solely garnered INR 2.25 lakhs worth net corporate sponsorship and alumni contribution from regions of Mumbai
•Approached Messaging Companies and Media Platforms to have them as Messaging and Online Media Partners
•Led a team of 42 Campus Affiliates &12 Campus Ambassadors responsible for the publicity of Kshitij 2020
•As Web Sub-coordinator managed Kshitij's official website and ensured the update about the fest

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Worked with a team of 33 members for the publicity and for the execution of 33 events, 13 workshops, 4 exhibitions, 6 guest lectures, and mega shows• Publicized the symposium across colleges of Kolkata & Nagpur and published 3 media articles in newspapers in Maharashtra• Assisted the members in the Guest Reception team and successfully accommodated all the guests of Kshitij at IIT Kharagpur during 3 days of the fest
positions.title: Kshitij Campus Affiliate
positions.description_html:
• Worked with a team of 33 members for the publicity and for the execution of 33 events, 13 workshops, 4 exhibitions, 6 guest lectures, and mega shows
• Publicized the symposium across colleges of Kolkata & Nagpur and published 3 media articles in newspapers in Maharashtra
• Assisted the members in the Guest Reception team and successfully accommodated all the guests of Kshitij at IIT Kharagpur during 3 days of the fest
